question: A chef needs to cook 15 potatoes. He has already cooked 6. If each potato takes 8 minutes to cook, how long will it take him to cook the rest?
response:
The chef has already cooked 6 potatoes, which means he has 15 - 6 = 9 potatoes left to cook.
Each potato takes 8 minutes to cook, so the total time required to cook all the potatoes is 9 potatoes x 8 minutes per potato = <<9*8=72>>72 minutes.
The answer is 72 minutes.
